issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement AVG aggregate expression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6658](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6658). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement AVG aggregate expression. See COUNT and SUM for inspiration.
